text: Apple introduces a new telephoto lens to the Pro Max that has...
full-pick-text: Apple introduces a new telephoto lens to the Pro Max that has 10x zoom, It will feature enhanced low light performance that is branded NightSight Pro, and it will include a new sensor-shift stabilization system
notes:
• "10x zoom"
  • "It will feature enhanced low light performance that is branded NightSight Pro"
  • "and it will include a new sensor-shift stabilization system."
